column2: "Oh-my-oh-my. It seems like you brought another odd person with you today."
"Really <%me>, I'm jealous that you keep making sooo many wonderful and strange friends as you go."
"Would you mind sharing some with me? It looks like they'll give me a strange euphoric feeling. I would definitely want to try shooting them someday."
"Ah... yea. Nice to meet you too."
"Fufufu. You're being cautious of me, aren't you? Don't worry, I won't do anything to you."
"By the way, you're someone who fires a gun right? Adding to that, you prefer snipers, right?"
"When you were cautious of Lisa, your legs were the first to react during that brief moment of fear. You tried to gain distance."
"However, there weren't any movements in your hands. Therefore, you're not the type who prepares a gun, perhaps someone who creates a gun, am I right?"
"Just by shaking your hand, did it actually reveal everything to that extent?"
"Fufufu. A sniper requires a perceptive eye. After all, catching even the slightest abnormality is the most important skill on the battlefield."
"Oh no! This isn't good at all. I was caught up in my happiness and started talking since I met someone with the same smell."
"Well then, I'll be taking my leave here. I want to keep shooting and killing more and more of those mysterious Phantoms on Earth."
"Their sensation is so fluffy, filled with uncertainty and vile to the point where it feels sooo good! Fufufu- Fufufufufu!"
"Hey... Do the weirdos tend to be more powerful within ARKS?"
